name: CubicProject
description:
In its simplest form, this is an almost direct recreation of The Cubic Structural Evolution Project by Olafur Eliasson.

This was a game I created in response to an art brief. I was to make a game that I was inspired by at the Gallery of Modern Art. The piece that struck out for me was the large room with a table full of lego. The artist wanted to challenge the notion that art can only be made by one person.

What I did to recreate that is the game saves the location of every block on quit and loads them all on start. It's doing that by loading/saving a .csv file. (blog coming soon). B).
